org.springframework.web.context.request

类 RequestContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.context.request.RequestContextListener
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.util.EventListener, ServletRequestListener

    public class RequestContextListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServletRequestListener
    Servlet listener that exposes the request to the current thread, through both LocaleContextHolder and RequestContextHolder. To be registered as listener in web.xml.

    Alternatively, Spring's RequestContextFilter and Spring's DispatcherServlet also expose the same request context to the current thread. In contrast to this listener, advanced options are available there (e.g. "threadContextInheritable").

    This listener is mainly for use with third-party servlets, e.g. the JSF FacesServlet. Within Spring's own web support, DispatcherServlet's processing is perfectly sufficient.

    从以下版本开始:
    2.0
    作者:
    Juergen Hoeller
    另请参阅:
    ServletRequestListener, LocaleContextHolder, RequestContextHolder, RequestContextFilter, DispatcherServlet

      • requestInitialized

        public void requestInitialized(ServletRequestEvent requestEvent)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.servlet.ServletRequestListener
        Receives notification that a ServletRequest is about to come into scope of the web application.
        指定者:
        requestInitialized 在接口中 ServletRequestListener
        参数:
        requestEvent - the ServletRequestEvent containing the ServletRequest and the ServletContext representing the web application
